1.0.0.name: wordpress/bugherd
1.0.0.description:
BugHerd is a new, modern and sleek bug tracker designed specifically to help web designers and developers to visually describe the bug(s) in a layout, plugin also provide some basic backend administration to allow you to select different user levels to report a bug from visitors to administrators and to create/select projects within WordPress administration.

Signing up

Signing up with BugHerd is one click process and free, plugin required you to have an account with BugHerd and if you have multiple blogs we recommend you to enable Restful API in your profile settings page and use API feature to login into BugHerd, select and add new project from within your WordPress administration.

More Information
